Subject: Pure Joy
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: Terry Barlow <twb176@...>

::WindRider::
"YAAAAHHHOOOO!!!!" WindRider yelled as he soared
through the sky. He had flown in beast mode before,
when he made his way to the CF, but that was only
because he had to. He had never flown just to fly. To
him, no feeling in the universe could compare. He
couldnt understand how any bot with flying ability
would rather fight than do this.If every bot could
feel what he felt at this moment, he thought, then
maybe the fighting would stop.
